tool_description: US zip codes in JSON format along with city, county, and state information
name: US Zip Codes
title: US Zip Codes

api_list.name: Zips
api_list.description: This endpoint returns US zip codes in JSON format along with city, county, and state information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com/zips"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com/zips"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
